MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:59PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed there is a fault on the overhead line network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible,  due to repairs required we now expect the power to be restored by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35PM on 26th March 2021
